metas.name: Wild Kratts
metas.description: Combines adventure with learning about animals and their habitats, similar to 'The Magic School Bus' and 'Ada Twist, Scientist'.

metas.name: Octonauts
metas.description: Features a team of underwater explorers solving problems and learning about marine life, echoing the educational adventure of 'The Magic School Bus' and the problem-solving of 'Ada Twist, Scientist'.

metas.name: Ask the StoryBots
metas.description: An energetic and musical show that answers kids' questions about the world, much like 'Ada Twist, Scientist' and 'Peg + Cat' in its educational approach.

metas.name: Sid the Science Kid
metas.description: Encourages curiosity and scientific thinking through everyday experiences, similar to 'Ada Twist, Scientist' and 'The Magic School Bus'.

metas.name: Cyberchase
metas.description: Uses math and science to solve mysteries, aligning with the educational and problem-solving aspects of 'Ada Twist, Scientist' and 'Peg + Cat'.

metas.name: Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood
metas.description: Teaches social-emotional skills through relatable situations, offering a gentle and learning-focused experience like 'Doc McStuffins' and 'Clifford the Big Red Dog'.

metas.name: Molly of Denali
metas.description: Features a young Alaskan Native girl who uses technology and learns about her culture, combining education and adventure in a way similar to 'Ada Twist, Scientist'.

metas.name: Tumble Leaf
metas.description: A gentle and visually stunning show that encourages exploration and discovery through nature, akin to the curiosity fostered in 'Curious George' and 'Bluey'.

metas.name: Puffin Rock
metas.description: A beautifully animated series about two young puffins exploring their island, promoting curiosity and family bonds, reminiscent of 'Bluey' and 'Curious George'.

metas.name: Little Bear
metas.description: Focuses on the simple joys of childhood, imagination, and family relationships, similar to the heartwarming feel of 'Clifford the Big Red Dog' and 'Doc McStuffins'.

metas.name: Yo Gabba Gabba!
metas.description: A vibrant and musical show that teaches life lessons and encourages positive behavior in a fun, energetic way, similar to 'Peg + Cat's' engagement.

metas.name: Arthur
metas.description: A long-running series that tackles relatable childhood issues with humor and heart, akin to the family and learning aspects of 'Clifford the Big Red Dog'.

metas.name: Reading Rainbow
metas.description: An iconic show that promotes a love of reading and learning through diverse books and engaging segments, similar to the educational spirit of 'The Magic School Bus'.

metas.name: Sesame Street
metas.description: A classic educational program that teaches foundational skills like letters, numbers, and social-emotional development in a fun and engaging way.

metas.name: Dragon Tales
metas.description: Children enter a magical world of dragons where they learn about friendship, problem-solving, and emotions, similar to 'Doc McStuffins' and 'Clifford the Big Red Dog'.

metas.name: The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About That!
metas.description: Explores scientific concepts and the natural world through engaging stories and songs, directly aligning with 'The Magic School Bus' and 'Ada Twist, Scientist'.

metas.name: Super Why!
metas.description: Uses fairy tales and literacy skills to solve problems, offering an educational adventure similar to 'WordGirl' and 'Peg + Cat'.

metas.name: Paw Patrol
metas.description: A team of rescue dogs solves problems and helps others, offering adventure and teamwork, which might appeal to fans of 'WordGirl' and 'Special Agent Oso'.

metas.name: Go, Diego, Go!
metas.description: An educational show that teaches about animals and the environment while encouraging Spanish language learning, similar to 'Curious George' and 'Octonauts'.

metas.name: Team Umizoomi
metas.description: Uses math concepts to solve everyday problems, fitting the educational and problem-solving themes found in 'Peg + Cat' and 'Ada Twist, Scientist'.

metas.name: Bubble Guppies
metas.description: An energetic musical show that teaches a variety of subjects, from science to art, in an entertaining way, similar to 'Peg + Cat' and 'Ask the StoryBots'.

metas.name: Sarah & Duck
metas.description: A gentle and whimsical show that explores imagination and the world around us, echoing the calming and curious nature of 'Bluey' and 'Tumble Leaf'.

metas.name: Henry Hugglemonster
metas.description: Follows the everyday adventures of a young monster, focusing on family, friendship, and creativity, with a similar feel to 'Doc McStuffins' and 'Bluey'.

metas.name: If You Give a Mouse a Cookie
metas.description: Based on the popular book series, this show follows the fun and often silly consequences of a mouse's requests, with a lighthearted, adventurous tone.

metas.name: Hilda
metas.description: A young girl has adventures in a world filled with magical creatures, blending fantasy and exploration in a similar vein to 'The Magic School Bus' and 'The Good Place's' imaginative elements.

metas.name: Carmen Sandiego
metas.description: An animated action-adventure series that teaches about geography and history through globe-trotting capers, similar to 'WordGirl's' problem-solving and educational aspects.

metas.name: Dragons: Rescue Riders
metas.description: Young Viking twins team up with young dragons to rescue creatures and solve problems, offering adventure and teamwork like 'Paw Patrol'.

metas.name: T.U.F.F. Puppy
metas.description: A comedic animated series about a canine secret agent, blending humor and action in a kid-friendly way, reminiscent of the lighthearted action in 'WordGirl'.

metas.name: Chico Bon Bon: Monkey with a Tool Belt
metas.description: A cheerful monkey who helps his friends solve problems using tools and engineering principles, aligning with the practical learning of 'Ada Twist, Scientist'.

metas.name: Esme & Roy
metas.description: Two monster sitters help young monsters navigate challenges and learn new skills, offering gentle guidance and problem-solving, similar to 'Doc McStuffins'.

metas.name: Ghostwriter
metas.description: A group of kids solves mysteries using their literacy skills, blending adventure and education in a way that echoes 'Super Why!' and 'WordGirl'.

metas.name: Rhyme Time Town
metas.description: A musical show that teaches about rhyme, rhythm, and early literacy through fun adventures, similar to 'Peg + Cat' and 'Ask the StoryBots'.

metas.name: Dinosaurs
metas.description: A classic family sitcom with animatronic dinosaurs that tackles everyday family issues with humor, offering a fun and lighthearted sitcom experience.

metas.name: Jelly Jamm
metas.description: A colorful and musical show about four characters exploring their world and learning about friendship and music, similar to the joyful and educational elements of 'Peg + Cat'.

metas.name: Wolf!
metas.description: A beautifully animated short based on the book, exploring themes of identity and courage in a visually engaging way, akin to the artistic and heartwarming aspects of 'Bluey'.
